languages.text: "Треть была доставлена в улей Сципиона 84-249 на Даргонусе, где позже вспыхнул мятеж. А последняя часть осталась на флагмане. Понимаете, куда я клоню? Спустя столетия в каждом месте, куда были доставлены грузы, появился культ мутантов".

"A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."
languages.original_text: "Треть была доставлена в улей Сципиона 84-249 на Даргонусе, где позже вспыхнул мятеж. А последняя часть осталась на флагмане. Понимаете, куда я клоню? Спустя столетия в каждом месте, куда были доставлены грузы, появился культ мутантов".

traits.locale_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the last part was left on the flagship. Can you see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

"A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

languages.text: «Un segundo tercio se llevó a la colmena Scipione 84-249 de Dargonus, donde más tarde estalló un motín, y el último se quedó en la nave insignia. Creo que entiende por dónde voy. Siglos más tarde, apareció un culto de mutantes en cada una de las ubicaciones en las que se entregaron estos envíos».
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

traits.locale_text: «Un segundo tercio se llevó a la colmena Scipione 84-249 de Dargonus, donde más tarde estalló un motín, y el último se quedó en la nave insignia. Creo que entiende por dónde voy. Siglos más tarde, apareció un culto de mutantes en cada una de las ubicaciones en las que se entregaron estos envíos».

languages.text: 「3分の1はダルゴナスのハイヴ、Scipione 84-249に運ばれたが、そこで反乱が起こり、最後の3分の1は旗艦に残されました。私が何を言いたいか、分かりますか？数百年後、積荷が届けられたすべての場所で、ミュータントのカルト集団が出現しました」
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

traits.locale_text: 「3分の1はダルゴナスのハイヴ、Scipione 84-249に運ばれたが、そこで反乱が起こり、最後の3分の1は旗艦に残されました。私が何を言いたいか、分かりますか？数百年後、積荷が届けられたすべての場所で、ミュータントのカルト集団が出現しました」

languages.text: “另外三分之一的货物，被运到了达戈努斯的希皮奥内84-249号巢都，那里后来发生了叛乱。而最后的三分之一的货物，则留在了这艘旗舰上。相信大人您已经明白我的意思了吧？那些货物被运达目的地的几百年后，每个接收货物的地方都出现了变种人邪教。”
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

traits.locale_text: “另外三分之一的货物，被运到了达戈努斯的希皮奥内84-249号巢都，那里后来发生了叛乱。而最后的三分之一的货物，则留在了这艘旗舰上。相信大人您已经明白我的意思了吧？那些货物被运达目的地的几百年后，每个接收货物的地方都出现了变种人邪教。”

languages.text: "Ein Drittel wurde zur Makropole Scipione 84-249 auf Dargonus gebracht, wo später eine Meuterei ausbrach, und das letzte Drittel verblieb auf dem Flaggschiff. Ihr seht sicher, worauf ich damit hinauswill? Jahrhunderte später tauchte ein Kult von Mutanten an jedem Ort auf, zu dem die Lieferungen gebracht wurden."
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Drittel wurde zur Makropole Scipione 84-249 auf Dargonus gebracht, wo später eine Meuterei ausbrach, und das letzte Drittel verblieb auf dem Flaggschiff. Ihr seht sicher, worauf ich damit hinauswill? Jahrhunderte später tauchte ein Kult von Mutanten an jedem Ort auf, zu dem die Lieferungen gebracht wurden."

languages.text: « Un autre tiers fut acheminé jusqu'à la ruche Scipione 84-249 sur Dargonus, où une mutinerie éclata par la suite, et le reste fut conservé à bord du vaisseau amiral. Vous voyez sûrement où je veux en venir... Des siècles plus tard, une secte de mutants a vu le jour à chaque endroit où la cargaison avait été livrée. »
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."

traits.locale_text: « Un autre tiers fut acheminé jusqu'à la ruche Scipione 84-249 sur Dargonus, où une mutinerie éclata par la suite, et le reste fut conservé à bord du vaisseau amiral. Vous voyez sûrement où je veux en venir... Des siècles plus tard, une secte de mutants a vu le jour à chaque endroit où la cargaison avait été livrée. »

languages.text: "Üçte biri, Dargonus'taki Scipione 84-249 kovanına götürüldü. Ardından burada ayaklanma çıktı. Üçte birlik son kısmı ise sancak gemisinde bırakıldı. Bu anlattıklarıma nereye varacağımı muhakkak ki tahmin etmişsinizdir. Asırlar sonra malların iletildiği her bir konumda mutant tarikatları ortaya çıktı."
languages.original_text: "A third was taken to hive Scipione 84-249 on Dargonus, where a mutiny broke out later, and the final third was left on the flagship. Surely you can see where I am going with this? Centuries later, a cult of mutants emerged in every single location the shipments were delivered to."
